Key Match Events: Dhananjaya de Silva reached an outstanding half-century
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan will exit the tournament with this loss
Sri Lanka keep their chances of making it to the semi-finals alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan did not get much swing at the start of the inning
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took an early wicket
Dhananjaya de Silva guided Sri Lanka to an easy win with 9 balls to spare
